name: Dragon Strike
description:
As a member of the elite Dragon Strike Force, your mission is to secure supply caches in a post-apocalyptic town infested with zombies and other nasties. But you only have one day to complete your mission before they nuke the whole town. Good luck!

Free to Download

The demo is free to download, but you are welcome to donate a small amount that will go towards further game development and further development of SoulLink AI products.

How to Play

  • Use mouse wheel to cycle through weapons. You won't see the weapon bar until you start scrolling the wheel.
  • Hold right mouse button to aim weapon and press left mouse button to fire
  • Use WASD keys for movement
  • Use C key to crouch
  • Hold shift key to sprint
  • Press Escape to bring up menu

Known Issues and Current Limitations

  • There is no Quit Game menu option so just use Alt-F4 when you are done playing
  • Molotov Cocktail does not affect AI or the spider nests yet. But they look cool! ;)
  • Grenade will affect AI, but not the spider nest.
  • Save game works for the most part, but won't save the player's inventory yet. Also, Points of Interest do not save so they will be rediscovered if you save and then load game.
  • Only one of the two available quests can be completed at this time. There is currently only one supply cache that can be secured.

Alpha Notes

This a game in active development. This is an early alpha version of the game and it is incomplete. 

Development Notes

This game uses SoulLink Procedural AI Spawner from the Unity Asset Store and the upcoming SoulLink AI System, which is in early alpha development state. It is meant as an example game to showcase the features of SoulLink

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/soullink-procedural-ai-spawner-21...
